This afternoon, Governor Holcomb closed Indiana schools through May 1st as a precautionary measure against the Covid-19 (Corona) virus. BCCSC will observe Spring Break next week (March 23-27). Our school buildings will also be under a mandatory shutdown that week.

From March 30-May 1 we will observe the following schedule:

Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday will be eLearning Days.

Monday and Friday will be Waiver Days (NO School)

A calendar will be shared at a later date.

Other items:

All Standardized State Testing is cancelled.

The IHSAA Boys’ Basketball Tournament has been cancelled.

The BCHS Prom has been rescheduled for Friday May 8th, if school is in session at that time.

The BCHS Class of 2020 Graduation remains scheduled for Saturday, May 23rd.

Please continue to follow all proper personal hygiene guidelines.

Thank you to our students, parents, teachers, counselors, administrators, and support staff for your flexibility, patience, and understanding. We intend to deliver the best learning opportunities possible to our students during these trying times.
